body.name: MOROVOL ATX PC Gaming Case with 4pcs RGB Fans Airflow Mid-Tower with Diamond-Shaped Mesh Front & Tempered Glass Side Panel Computer Chassis (621-N4)
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 16 mins
features: 4PCS RGB Fans for Gifts - The 621 pc case is pre-installed with 4 RGB 120mm case fans, which are fixed RGB lighting capable and can provide considerable airflow to enhance cooling. (Note: The lighting is fixed, not addressable.)

Perfect Airflow - The diamond mesh front panel of this ATX case is the optimal cooling performance panel that features a stereo contour. While this case can provide amazingly high airflow, it can also showcase great lighting effects. So you don't have to worry about the heat dissipation during the operation of the chassis and enjoy it wantonly.

Precise Design - Morovol 621-N4 computer case supports ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX, the GPU is up to 300mm, the PSU is up to 160mm and the CPU cooling height is up to 155mm. In addition, it can support to install 2 x 2.5 "SSDs + 2 x 3.5" HDDs.

Tempered Glass Side Panel - The Mid-tower case is designed with removable tempered glass side panel. The precise design makes this tower case both solid and beautiful. The glass side panel has high light transmittance, which can perfectly display your accessories. The removable glass side panel also makes it easy to install internal PC components.

Excellent I/O Panel - The 621 gaming case provides fast and easy access to the I/O panel, with 1 USB 3.0 port (faster data transfer), 2 USB 2.0 ports, HD audio and microphone ports, reset and power button.

Cost-effective Case - Morovol 621-N4 gaming pc case is pre-installed with 4 fans. The mesh front panel provides strong airflow. The affordable price brings a surprise of high-performance chassis, which can meet the component needs of middle tower chassis enthusiasts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOROVOL ATX PC Case 621 Are you looking for a super cost-effective gaming pc case? ----That definitely is MOROVOL 621 computer case! Cost-effective Case - MOROVOL 621-N4 gaming pc case is pre-installed with 4 fans. The mesh front panel provides strong airflow. The affordable pay brings a surprise of high-performance chassis, which can meet the component needs of middle tower chassis enthusiasts.4PCS RGB Fans for Gifts - The 621 pc case is pre-installed with 4 RGB 120mm case fans, which are fixed RGB lighting capable and can provide considerable airflow to enhance cooling. (Note: The lighting is fixed, not addressable.)Perfect Airflow - The diamond mesh front panel of this ATX case is the optimal cooling performance panel that features a stereo contour. While this case can provide amazingly high airflow, it can also showcase great lighting effects. So you don't have to worry about the heat dissipation during the operation of the chassis and enjoy it wantonly.Tempered Glass Side Panel - The Mid-tower case is designed with removable tempered glass side panel. The precise design makes this tower case both solid and beautiful. The glass side panel has high light transmittance, which can perfectly display your accessories. The removable glass side panel also makes it easy to install internal PC components.

ATX case with Mesh Front Panel and Tempered Glass Side Panel MOROVOL PC case ultra-fine performance mesh front panel promotes great airflow and maintains lower system temperatures.Featureing a tempered Glass Side panel in a compact Mid-tower. Case included RGB fans flood the build with lighting.

Simple design. Save space. Excellent I/O Panel ----The 621 gaming case provides fast and easy access to the I/O panel, with 1 USB 3.0 port (faster data transfer), 2 USB 2.0 ports, HD audio and microphone ports, reset and power button.

More Details about the MOROVOL 621 series ATX tower PC case Maximum CPU Cooler Height 150 mm Maximum GPU Length 300 mm Maximum PSU Length ATX PSU, Max. Length 160 mm Drives Supports 2 x 2.5"SSD + 2 x 3.5''HDD Motherboard Compatibility ATX/ Micro-ATX/ Mini-ITX Cooling Method Air Expansion Slots 6 slots RGB Fans Support Front: 3 x 120 mm； Rear: 1 x 120 mm（Case with Pre-installed 4pcs Fans） Reminder about Fans Connect the fans header to the power header before turning on the power supply! (Prohibited turn on your power supply first.) Case Dimensions (HxLxW) 16.73" x 14.57" x 7.28" (425 x 370 x 185mm) Packing Weight 10.86 LB Package included 621-N4 case*1, RGB Fans *4, Manual *1, Screw accessories*1

How to install HDD in the 621 pc case? 1. Screw the screw through the rubber pad and lock it;2. Place the screws from the bottom up;3. The screw position is stuck forward;4. Screw the last screw to fixed.

R7 U3 852 621 Motherboard Support ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX Filters Top and bottom Top and bottom X X Number Of Fans Pre-installed 4 Fix Color RGB Fans 2 Non-LED Fans 2 Non-LED Fans 4 Fix Color RGB Fans Drive Bays 3x2.5" SSD + 2x3.5" HDD 3x2.5" SSD + 1x3.5" HDD 2x2.5"SSD + 1x3.5''HDD + 1x5.25"ODD 2x2.5"SSD + 2x3.5''HDD Radiator Support Top: 120mm, Rear: 120mm Top: 280mm/240mm, Rear: 120mm X X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, Design, Airflow and outstanding customer service
reviews.reviewText: The main reasons i got this case was because i liked the front panel and it already had 4 fans preinstalledThe case did come defective as 1 of the USB ports was not working, i contacted Morovol customer service and they sent me a replacement cable, and everything is working fine now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS CASE IS COLD! haha
reviews.reviewText: This case airflow is AMAZING, SUPERB. I am super pleased, and it looks nice too. If you are RGB crazy, this case delivers! Everything fits perfectly, and it's not too big and heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice aesthetics for a budget case but poor build quality.
reviews.reviewText: The case came in with many of the plastic tabs supporting the front panel broken. This was fixed with some superglue but this problem is reflective of the quality of the materials used. The case does have a nice aesthetic and is hard to beat for the price. The trade off here being lower quality materials being used. I would recommend saving $20-30 more dollars and buy a more premium case but for those on a budget this might be the right fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Awesome case, it's beautiful, small and realy spacious

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing case for cool temps !
reviews.reviewText: The case is SO good for temps. Seriously so cold and fans are great. Air flow great. Just not the best quality metal… it bends and forms very easy so need to be careful. Overall very satisfied with this case due to pre installed fans and temps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this
reviews.reviewText: The product says it’s supposed to be an ATX Full, and it’s more of a medium? Trying to get my secondary parts to build my new pc in this case was a hassle, it sounds like a jet engine, half the USB ports don’t work on the top. Every time I plug a keyboard into it, the keyboard seizes to stop working roughly about 15 minutes after. The cable management is really bad, for an 80$ case, just get a Corsair. This thing blows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth buying for first PC build!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t compare cases because this was my first PC build, but if you’re looking for a budget build that has adequate airflow this is one to look into. Comes with 4 RGB fans that installs into ur power supply, and the front panel pattern makes it stand out. I’ll say the only downside about it the case is that you can’t control the lights and adjust to any colors, it stays the same. But in all honesty like I mentioned before it’s a great case for a budget build. I put my whole build together for only $700 and I’d recommend this case if you don’t mind what color the fans are. Super quite, well lit, and good airflow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars More flimsy than I thought
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to help my fiance build a PC. The case is 100% a budget case in every sense with some pretty lighting. All of the fans are molex only which isn't great but whatever. The aluminum the case is made out of is very easy to bend.Overall for a budget case it isn't bad but I would just pay a few more bucks for something better.
